meanings.definition: The state of being healthy and free from illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: Her healthfulness was evident in her glowing skin and energetic demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The healthfulness of the vegetables in the salad made it a nutritious meal.
meanings.sent3: The healthfulness of the situation was like a bright ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent4: His commitment to healthfulness was a beacon of inspiration for others.
meanings.sent5: The healthfulness of the fresh air in the mountains was invigorating.

meanings.definition: The quality of promoting good health.
meanings.sent1: The healthfulness of the exercise routine helped improve her overall well-being.
meanings.sent2: Choosing fruits and vegetables for snacks is a simple way to increase healthfulness in your diet.
meanings.sent3: The healthfulness of the new wellness program was met with enthusiasm by the employees.
meanings.sent4: The healthfulness of her advice was like a dose of medicine for those seeking a healthier lifestyle.
meanings.sent5: The healthfulness of the herbal tea was soothing and comforting after a long day.
